attr.title: DEVOLVER Bootleg
attr.desc: Devolver Bootleg contains 8 original rip offs of Devolver games.
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1066260/Devolver_Bootleg/ Locate the data.win, MAP File, DUNGEON File, 2 folders and copy them into generate folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1066260/Devolver_Bootleg/) Locate the data.win, MAP File, DUNGEON File, 2 folders and copy them into the gamedata folder.
